physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It is a woven textile with multicolored embroidery work. The hanging is decorated with stylized depictions of peacocks, cows, elephants, trees, and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the left of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a square top and seven dangling panels along the bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) swastikas beadwork (visual works)
